snippet.title: Ghostwire: Tokyo Spider's Thread Update | Deep Dive Trailer
snippet.description:
Available free for all Ghostwire: Tokyo players, the Spider’s Thread update includes an all-new game mode – descend The Spider’s Thread as you complete challenges, earn upgrades and test your skills. How long will you last? 

That’s not all: The Spider’s Thread update also includes multiple additions and enhancements to the base game, including more enemies, skills, areas to explore, side missions, extended story cinematics, Photo Mode enhancements and more!

The Spider’s Thread update for Ghostwire: Tokyo is available NOW for Xbox Series X|S and PC.

ESRB RATING: Teen with Violence and Language

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/ghostwire-tokyo/9pkp39cl0c8d
